entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
